Key Match Events: Y. Tielemans scored the opening goal for Belgium at the 2nd minute
K. De Bruyne scored the second goal for Belgium at the 80th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco, Belgium's coach, expressed relief at the win and mentioned the importance of creating chances
Edward Iordanescu, Romania's coach, acknowledged the quality of Belgium's team and expressed faith in his own team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Cologne, Germany
Belgium fans were seen celebrating after the match
Others: The match was part of the Group Stage of the European Championship 2024
The result keeps Belgium alive in the tournament
